description: This table contains the previous values from edited flowsheet records.

columns.name: FSD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the flowsheet data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for the item.

columns.name: OCCURANCE
columns.description: If the flowsheet group/row appears multiple times, this will distinguish the occurrence.

columns.name: LINE_NUM
columns.description: The line number of the reading that replaced this flowsheet reading.

columns.name: RECORDED_TIME
columns.description: The instant the reading was taken.

columns.name: ENTRY_TIME
columns.description: The instant the reading was entered.

columns.name: TAKEN_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user taking the flowsheet readings.

columns.name: ENTRY_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user entering the readings.

columns.name: EDIT_COMMENT
columns.description: The free text comments associated with the reading.

columns.name: EDITED_LINE
columns.description: Determines if this flowsheet record has been edited.

columns.name: ACCEPTED_YN
columns.description:
Determines if this flowsheet record has been accepted.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: IP_SIGNIFCNT_EDI_YN
columns.description:
Stores edited information on whether the user marked the data value as being significant.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ACCEPTED_YN

columns.name: EDITED_DEV_ID
columns.description: This item stores information of the Device ID for the device from which data is captured from when the data is edited.

columns.name: EDITED_DEV_ID_DEVICE_NAME
columns.description: The name for this device.

columns.name: EDITED_RECEIVE_INST
columns.description: This item stores the Instant at which value was received at the interface  when the data is edited.

columns.name: AUDIT_NEED_COSIG_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a value needing a co-sign is stored for the audit record for the flowsheet data record. Yes indicates that a value needing a co-sign gets over-written with a value not needing a co-sign.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Required Yes


Chosen Yes


Required Yes Can File

columns.name: EDITED_FLT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the flowsheet template (FLT) which was used to enter this data into the cell.

columns.name: EDITED_FLT_ID_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The display name associated with this template.

columns.name: EDT_FLO_DAT_USED
columns.description: If the contact date (DAT) used to define data for a flowsheet group or row (see column FLO_DAT_USED) is changed, this column stores the prior value.

columns.name: EDITED_PENDED_ID
columns.description: History of the user ID of the user who pended a flowsheet value.

columns.name: EDITED_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: History of date/time at which a flowsheet value was pended.

columns.name: AUDIT_ABNORMAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores whether or not the edited value is abnormal


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes

columns.name: FLO_CNCT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This column converts the contact date (DAT) of the flowsheet group or row to DTE, based on the value in column FLO_DAT_USED.

columns.name: EDITD_3P_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
History of identification of the third-party framework that a Flowsheets value originally came from, if applicable. Intended to be used to track values that are sourced from health/fitness frameworks (e.g. Apple's HealthKit) to provide additional context when examining attached metadata.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Apple HealthKit


Withings


Fitbit


Google Fit


FHIR

columns.name: PAT_REPORTED_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates if the edited data was directly entered by the patient or a patient proxy and whether the data has been validated by a clinician


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not Patient Reported


Patient reported, not clinician validated


Patient reported, clinician validated

columns.name: MYPT_ID
columns.description: The MyChart account from which the edited data was entered.

columns.name: EDIT_IS_FROM_SPEECH_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether an edited flowsheet value was entered using speech entry.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ACCEPTED_YN

columns.name: EDITED_ABNORMAL_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores metadata for abnormal flowsheet values. Edited Abnormal Type is only populated for data where AUDIT_ABNORMAL_C is set to 1-Yes. It is set to 1-Low for data that is below the minimum warning level and it is set to 2-High for data that is above the maximum warning level for flowsheet data of types: numeric, blood pressure, temperature, height, patient height, weight and patient weight. It is set to 0-Unspecified for data that is abnormal for other reasons. This is the only value that can be set for flowsheet data of type:  custom list.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Unspecified


Low


High


Patient-Entered Flowsheet Rule Abnormal

columns.name: EDIT_FLO_NET_INI
columns.description: The INI to which the value for this row is associated.

columns.name: EDIT_FLO_CAT_INI
columns.description: The INI of an edited category flowsheet value

columns.name: EDIT_FLO_CAT_ITEM
columns.description: The item number of a category flowsheet value

columns.name: EDIT_FLO_CAT_VALUE
columns.description: The category value of an edited flowsheet row

columns.name: EDIT_DOC_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the method the user used to enter the line of flowsheet data.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Value From Macro

columns.name: EDITED_MACRO_RECORD_ID
columns.description: When the documentation method in FSD-2360 is 1-Value From Macro this is the macro HGM record ID.

columns.name: EDITED_MACRO_RECORD_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Scripting Template.
